question: Where can I obtain information about transitioning to Anthem FSA from another administrator?
response: We welcome FSA business from other carriers. We will accept carryover dollars, if applicable, from the prior carrier once run out is complete. We will not, however, administer grace period. Please see the Anthem FSA Administrator Transition Overview doc for more information

question: Where can I find information on how a non medically enrolled dependent can obtain an Anthem Spending Accounts debit card?
response: Please see the Anthem Spending Accounts debit card process for non medically enrolled dependents doc
